alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Major; Woods (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 02 at 3:20PM CDT until May 02 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WOODS...WESTERN ALFALFA AND MAJOR COUNTIES... At 320 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Dacoma to 4 miles northeast of Orion, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alva, Fairview, Cherokee, Helena, Carmen, Cleo Springs, Aline, Burlington, Dacoma, Amorita, Byron, Lambert, Orion, Orienta, Ingersoll, Isabella, Driftwood and Hopeton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
